name: onboarding-service-qa
description: QA Automation Framework for Onboarding Service

scripts.test: TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) && mocha --require ts-node/register 'tests/**/*.spec.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports/html,reportFilename=test-report-$TIMESTAMP,reportTitle='QA Test Report',reportPageTitle='Onboarding Service QA',html=true,json=true,inline=true,charts=true,code=true; REPORT_TIMESTAMP=$TIMESTAMP REPORT_JSON=reports/html/test-report-$TIMESTAMP.json ts-node matrix/generate-traceability-matrix.ts
scripts.test:selective: TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) && mocha --require ts-node/register 'tests/**/*.spec.ts' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports/html,reportFilename=selective-test-report-$TIMESTAMP,reportTitle='Selective QA Test Report',reportPageTitle='Selective Test Execution',html=true,json=true,inline=true,charts=true,code=true; REPORT_TIMESTAMP=$TIMESTAMP REPORT_JSON=reports/html/selective-test-report-$TIMESTAMP.json ts-node matrix/generate-traceability-matrix.ts --selective

author: QA Team
